--- mattwo7 <Matfour@...> wrote:

> I have one last question...are there multiple story lines? There seem
> to be quite a few subject lines around... not just one
> straightforward
> story topic

Yep there are many story lines all operating in the same general
backdrop. Most of us are either on the moon or somewhere on Earth. It
helps to keep our locations separate by using different subject lines.
I hope it is not too confusing for you. The easiest way for you to jump
in would be to create your own story line, describe in general terms
where you are and allow one of us to merge with you. 

I hope that helps. Feel free to ask as many questions as you like, and
I am sure we will all be glad to help you to slide in as smoothly as
possible. 

Preston
